content.rendered:
Directed by Park Chul-Hwan. Khan Lee

Written by Lee Soo-Yeon

Cast Seo Kang-Joon( Kim Sae-Ha10 episodes, 2022 ). Kim Ah-jung( Jung Sae-Byeok10 episodes, 2022 ). Mu-Yeol Kim( Song Eo-Jin10 episodes, 2022 ). Victoria Grace( Jung Saebyeok10 episodes, 2022 ). Lee Si-young( Ghost10 episodes, 2022 ). Kim Seong-gyoon( Kim Ma-Nok10 episodes, 2022 ). Eugene Ko( Kim Sae Ha10 episodes, 2022 ). Melina Demir( Reporter)

Language Korean

Producers Min Hyun-il. Lee Seong-jin

Production Ace Factory. Arc Media.

Season 1

Episodes 10
